author: By Hira Humayun and Claudia Rebaza, CNN
title: Hundreds of tourists stranded in Machu Picchu amid Peru protests - CNN
description: International visitors struggle to leave Peru's ancient attraction after trains and flights suspended amid violent unrest following the arrest of President Pedro Castillo.
